# common

**Type Property**

A pseudo-mode that includes one or more other run loop modes.

## Declaration

```swift
static let common: RunLoop.Mode
```

## Discussion

When you add an object to a run loop using this mode, the runloop monitors the object when running in any of the common modes. For details about adding a runloop mode to the set of common modes, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFRunLoopAddCommonMode(_:_:)].

## System Run Loop Modes

- **default**: The mode set to handle input sources other than connection objects.
- **eventTracking**: The mode set when tracking events modally, such as a mouse-dragging loop.
- **modalPanel**: The mode set when waiting for input from a modal panel, such as a save or open panel.
- **tracking**: The mode set while tracking in controls takes place.
